properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 7 at 6:44PM EST until February 8 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Blacksburg VA
properties.description:
...Accumulating Snow West of the Blue Ridge...

* WHAT...Winter Storm Warning above 3500 feet with additional snow
of 2 to 4 inches with total accumulations of 4 to 7 inches.
Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Winter Weather
Advisory, snow with accumulations of up to two inches. Winds
gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Grayson County.

* WHEN...Until midnight EST tonight.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds will also generate blowing
and drifting snow.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT ABOVE 3500 FEET... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT
